description_html:
Marmo - a medley of intricately realised marble mosaic tiles from Greg Natale for Teranova Ceramics

A standout feature in Greg Natale’s interiors, are his use of floor and wall tiles to add detail, warmth and drama - bringing spaces to life. It is fitting then that he brings his creative vision to this new medium, now available for use in your own interior.

Embracing a passion for geometric pattern, Greg Natale presents seven striking designs inspired by some of the greats of Italian Architecture. Names that have revolutionised the way we look at and engage with the space around us.
product_name: Marmo Collection by Greg Natale Design
